name: Giphy Plugin
description: This plugin brings the powers of Giphy to Mattermost.

settings.help_text: Y, G, PG, PG-13, R, Unrated, or NSFW
Set a Value from 0-10 which makes results weirder as you go up the scale. The value determines how `weird` (or random) the GIF suggestions that Giphy will return to an end-user

settings_schema.footer: * To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-giphy).
